snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan has said he wants to focus on the nation’s looming debt crisis, but Democrats are assailing his stances on issues like abortion, gun control and women’s health.
abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan of Wisconsin, who has been chosen as Mitt Romney's vice-presidential running mate, has said he wants to focus on the nation’s looming debt crisis, but Democrats are assailing his stances on issues like abortion, gun control and women’s health.
lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan has said he wants to focus on the nation’s looming debt crisis, but Democrats are assailing his stances on issues like abortion, gun control and women’s health.

headline.seo: Paul D. Ryan’s Social Views Come to the Forefront
headline.main: As Ryan Looks to Focus on Economy, Spotlight Shines on His Other Views
headline.print_headline: As Ryan Looks to Focus On Economy, Spotlight Shines on His Other Views

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
